intro: Pycreus nitens, commonly known as the slender pycreus, is a flowering plant native to the Andean region of South America. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and vegetables. The plant is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, greenish-white flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are finely divided and have a mild, peppery scent when crushed. Pycreus nitens is often grown as an ornamental plant for its delicate appearance and fragrance.
